SELECT r.* FROM splash_resource r WHERE r.deleted = false
AND r.enabled = #{enabled}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM splash_strategy s WHERE s.enabled = true AND s.deleted = false AND s.resource_id = r.id AND s.start_time <= now() and s.end_time > now() AND s.target_platforms @> ARRAY[#{platform}::text] )
ORDER BY r.create_time DESC
